_sText:
1.Medium area zm map 

2.Three soundtracks that can be toggled by music player(radio near christmas tree)

3.Custom particles(Snow, lights. 1 texture is missed, will be fixed in next version)

4.Shader clouds.

5.Three spectial weapons that are thrown all over the map in the guise of small gifts.(taken from my stalker map)

6.Epic Christmas atmosphere.
